name: Speechless (itch)
description:
A short twine game about trying to say goodbye to someone that you love(d). It's about finding the words you feel comfortable sharing online.

Warning: This game explores the death of a loved one and trying to say goodbye. It might be difficult if you've recently gone through a similar experience.

Made for Porpentine's Twiny Jam, a challenge to make a twine game with a limit of 300 words.

This game is number 13 of my fiftytwo games challenge.
